perturbation.original_text: Payment of the Royalty shall be made no later than 45 days after the termination of the preceding full calendar quarter.
perturbation.changed_text: Payment of the Royalty shall be made no later than 30 days after the termination of the preceding full calendar quarter.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline for the royalty payments. Section 3.b now states 30 days instead of 45, creating ambiguity and uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: Bizzingo agrees that any use of the Property for advertising, promotional or sale purposes will be approved in advance by Theismann. Theismann agrees that such material, submitted for approval as provided herein may be deemed by Bizzingo to have been approved hereunder if the same is not disapproved by the Theismann in writing within fourteen (14) days after Theismann’s receipt thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: Bizzingo agrees that any use of the Property for advertising, promotional or sale purposes will be approved in advance by Theismann. Theismann agrees that such material, submitted for approval as provided herein may be deemed by Bizzingo to have been approved hereunder if the same is not disapproved by the Theismann in writing within seven (7) days after Theismann’s receipt thereof.
perturbation.explanation: This changes the approval timeframe from 14 days to 7 days, creating an inconsistency within the agreement. This results in uncertainty regarding the actual timeframe Theismann has to disapprove materials, creating potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Theismann shall have the right to terminate this Agreement at any time upon thirty (30) days' written notice to Bizzingo, such termination to become effective at the conclusion of such 30-day period.
perturbation.changed_text: Theismann shall have the right to terminate this Agreement at any time upon sixty (60) days' written notice to Bizzingo, such termination to become effective at the conclusion of such 60-day period.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides Theismann the right to terminate the agreement with 30 days written notice. This modification changes the notice period to 60 days creating uncertainty on which is correct.
